title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 40.13 - Advisory board
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 40.13 - Advisory board

State Regulations

An advisory board consisting of 10 members shall be
appointed by the commissioner to advise and assist in the administration of
this Part. Each member of the advisory board shall be an individual producer, including any individual who is active in a partnership, corporation, association or other business unit which is a producer as defined in this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
40.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
